Class Rover

java.lang.Object
Rover
public class Rover extends Object
This is a public class representing a Rover. The rover has a left and right pedal and starts at rest state (represented by a String) with a speed of zero (represented by an Integer). The rover has certain motor commands to move the rover. If you start from rest and press the left pedal once, it will accelerate forward. If you hold the left pedal for more than 5 seconds, it will accelerate backwards. There are many other commands as well. Some additional personalized commands include reaccelerating from deceleration by pressing both pedals and decelerating to rest.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor

    Rover()
    Creates a rover at a rest state with a speed of zero and a left and right pedal

      public void timer()

      public static void main(String[] args)
